mapper.select: SELECT mentoring.mentoringid AS mentoring_mentoringid, mentoring.mtitle AS mentoring_mtitle, u.username AS user_username, mentoring.mentoringdate AS mentoring_mentoringdate, mentoringoption.mentoringtime AS mentoringoption_mentoringtime, mentoring.mplace AS mentoring_mplace, mentoring.mmemberidcnt AS mentoring_mmemberidcnt,(mentoring.mentoringprice*1) AS purprice FROM purchasedetail purde INNER JOIN purchase pur ON purde.purchaseid=pur.purchaseid INNER JOIN mentoringoption mentoringoption ON purde.mentoringoptionid=mentoringoption.mentoringoptionid INNER JOIN mentoring mentoring ON mentoringoption.mentoringid=mentoring.mentoringid INNER JOIN mentor mentor ON mentoring.mentorid=mentor.mentorid INNER JOIN user u ON mentor.userid=u.userid WHERE pur.purchaseid=#{purchaseid}
